alert.note: Alert for Catalina and Santa Barbara Islands; Los Angeles County Coast including Downtown Los Angeles; Santa Clarita Valley; Ventura County Coast; Ventura County Coastal Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 05 at 2:25AM PST until March 05 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West to northwest winds 15 to 30 mph with gusts to 45 mph. * WHERE...Ventura County Coastal Valleys, Ventura County Coast, Santa Clarita Valley, Catalina and Santa Barbara Islands and Los Angeles County Coast including Downtown Los Angeles. * WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Catalina and Santa Barbara Islands; Los Angeles County Coast including Downtown Los Angeles; Santa Clarita Valley; Ventura County Coast; Ventura County Coastal Valleys
